channel.title: Comments on: Warcraft and The Godfather

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: I know, I know. Goddamit, I don't want to have cut and paste the entire Warcraft forums but if that's what it takes, then by God, that's what needs to be done.
item.content:encoded: I know, I know. Goddamit, I don’t want to have cut and paste the entire Warcraft forums but if that’s what it takes, then by God, that’s what needs to be done.

item.title: By: uruloki
item.dc:creator: uruloki
item.description: Hmmm, I seem to recall you learning from WoWDrama[current]-2 that you're supposed to repost the juicy bits here for us to laugh over for eternity. (Or, in my case, so that I can read them at work without worrying about firewalls...)
item.content:encoded: Hmmm, I seem to recall you learning from WoWDrama[current]-2 that you’re supposed to repost the juicy bits here for us to laugh over for eternity. (Or, in my case, so that I can read them at work without worrying about firewalls…)

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Bleh. Maybe the post author got the crap beat outta him at school after the GL saw the thread. Maybe he'll post about that now.
item.content:encoded: Bleh. Maybe the post author got the crap beat outta him at school after the GL saw the thread. Maybe he’ll post about that now.

item.title: By: Hyd
item.dc:creator: Hyd
item.description: Damn, that one sounded interesting, but the link is now dead.
item.content:encoded: Damn, that one sounded interesting, but the link is now dead.
